dt-api.name: button().collectionRebuild()

type.parameter: An array that is full of objects, strings or functions that are used to create buttons. Please refer to `b-init buttons.buttons` for full details of the configuration options available here.
type.returns: DataTables API instance with the selected button in the result set, available for chaining further operations on the button.
type.description: Rebuild the contents of the buttons collection based on the array that is passed in.

dt-api.description: This function is used to change, or update the contents of a collection button. This makes it possible to effortlessly add buttons to collections without having to redeclare the collection button.
